Find the value for an indicator for this month last year, or the previous month.

last_value.Rd

Find the value for an indicator for this month last year, or the previous month.

Usage

last_value(data, filter_with, ym = "year", print = TRUE)

Arguments

data

a dataframe of cleaned ABS Time Series data returned from readabs

filter_with

a list of variables to filter the dataframe on. Valid variables include gender, age, indicator, and series type.

ym

one of "year", "quarter", or "month" to return the value this time last year (the default), quarter, or month.

print

logical to pass the numeric on to as_comma or as_percent for printing. Defaults to TRUE

Value

numeric if print == FALSE, character if print == TRUE

Examples

library(reportabs)
labour_force_briefing <- read_absdata("labour_force_briefing")
#> Reading labour_force_briefing file found in /tmp/Rtmp8RCV37
last_value(labour_force_briefing, list(indicator = "Employed total",
series_type = "Seasonally Adjusted"))
#> [1] "14.25 million"
